long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chromium extension (supported in Chrome, Edge Chromium, Opera etc.) for Visual Studio Online, that allow developers to create a dev environment directly from GitHub and Azure Devops in just one click.
You can now create an environment from a GitHub PR page and review PRs in VS Online environment.
Internal developers can update the visual studio online host property in the extension settings, to point it to a different environment (ex: Dev).
